hero_text: Every job we do with our successful design team is a quality.
whoarewe_text: Slipyme Design was established for things like helping designers, suggesting ideas. You can also start an order as you wish with our expert team.
services_text: You can choose us when you need help with one of the following branches.
exams_text: Here are some of our designs that we have made before, prepared as samples and found for reference.
teams_text: We include people who are experts in their jobs and do good work in our team.
footer_text: Slipyme Design is a project belonging to Slipyme. The aim of this project, which is part of Slipyme, is to serve you in the graphic design industry.
error_text: Hoops! The page you are looking for could not be found.
order_text: We provide services in order to produce quality works as much as possible.
info_text_1: We are the Slipyme design team. This project is part of Slipyme.
info_text_2: We, as Slipyme Designer, offer designers a special chat and help environment.
info_text_3: We make designs according to your wishes and offer you a beautiful environment.
pricing_text: Our current purchases and works are carried out on our discord server. To come to Discord
desc_standard: In this plan, basic level designs are made..
desc_middle: In this plan, middle level designs are made.
desc_professional: In this plan, professional level designs are made.
